channel.title: Highscores pi
channel.description:
I currently have an in game hiscores using the score board it is functional but it will only show for online players I have decided I may make one that will be an online hiscores for skills and I was wondering how can I make my scoreboard one change from xp highscores into a pkers paradise scoreboard the score board would give 3 options upon clicking it,
1. Pk kills 2. PKP 3. KDR

item.title: Highscores pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So, I don’t know what system you have (makes it very difficult to help) but you can add 3 more rows into your MySQL database by going into your phpmyadmin, click on the name of the database where your highscores are stored, go into it’s table.
From there scroll down almost all the way to the bottom and find where it says “Add” and put 3 in the box instead of 1 for columns. I would select to add them at the end of the table.
After you click go you’ll be directed to a page with a bunch of prompts.
In the name field, substitute spaces with underscores and I’d go with all lowercase.
PKP and PK kills will be ints, and KDR will be a decimal.
From there I believe you can hit continue.
That should make the 3 columns you need.

The next part I can’t help without knowing how you’re sending the data to your database, and also your php code.

Read full topic
